assignBlank(
String
$content );

    

	

		
    Parameters
    
			
    $content
    
		
    element to be displayed
    
		
    Remarks
    

    Assign Blank is used if not using a template, example such as XML output

    $template = new template();
      $template2->assignBlank('This is a test');

    template::assignRepeat

String
$name, Array
$content );

    

	

		
    Parameters
    
			
    $name
    
		
    Repeat assignment name
    
			
    $content
    
		
    Array of arrays values
    
		
    Remarks
    

    Will assign to a repeating element from an assigned array 
      bassed on array row and element name eg.
    


      
  •  array{
    • 

  •          [0]=> array{
    • 

  •                  [name]=>'john'
    • 

  •                  [age]=>'14'
    • 

  •          }
    • 

  •          [1]=> array{
    • 

  •                  [name]=>'simon'
    • 

  •                  [age]=>'23'
    • 

  •          }
    • 

  •  }
    •
